Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I got KSP a few weeks ago and I must say its fun! I've used other space sims (Orbiter) and I just was never good at them. I could get into orbit without a problem but anything else was just frustrating for me. KSP is just pure fun for me. I landed on the Mun the other day and those final seconds before touchdown was amazing! I can't wait to see what else I can do!

Anyway, Hello everyone! I'm glad to be part of this community!
Well, I hope you have good launchings!
